function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emergence of demand for new services and perspectives on park management","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation due to changes in park management priorities","Mitigation":"Implement stricter health and safety measures and disease prevention strategies in park management","Technologies":"Smart sensors, surveillance cameras, and remote monitoring systems for early detection of disease outbreaks","People":"Local residents, park visitors, and municipal staff","Owner":"Municipal government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Organizational change shifting focus from aesthetics to ecological management","Impact":"Potential neglect of disease prevention and control measures in park management","Mitigation":"Provide training on disease prevention and control for park management staff","Technologies":"Online training modules, educational videos, and virtual workshops","People":"Park management staff and local residents","Owner":"Municipal government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Large number of urban green spaces managed by municipalities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to high population density in urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management strategies and social distancing measures in urban green spaces","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring apps, occupancy sensors, and communication systems for public announcements","People":"Local residents, park visitors, and municipal staff","Owner":"Municipal government and public health authorities"}]}
